channel.title: SoulSplit Release 1000+ players
channel.description:
[center]Hey guy's, I'd just like to say: The source and client is outdated (Less than 6 months.) - You may find some bugs.
Also, Rep+ is appreciated but not necessary just feel like releasing some stoof.
[ul][li] No NPC's are spawned addItem method needs to be redone Combat delay for teleporting/logging out needs to be fixed (one in combat you can't log back out.) No Bounty Hunter/Dungeoneering[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[size=36pt] DO NOT RELEASE FIXED - IF PEOPLE CBA TO FIX IT THEIR SELVES, THAT'S THEIR PROBLEM, SAME WITH RELEASING FIXES.[/size]
The goodies:
[ul][li] SoulSplits Combat Summoning Auth system (You've gotta do the website side) I believe the login server is disabled Minigames & Skills.[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
Download links:
[ul][li]Client (With world switcher): [url=http://uppit.com/7pzpa1wry3db/SoulSplit_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/7pzpa1wry3db/SoulSplit_Client.rar[/url] Source (Run with Eclipse): [url=http://uppit.com/nrywy6ugfj6w/SoulSplit_Source.rar]http://uppit.com/nrywy6ugfj6w/SoulSplit_Source.rar[/url][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
Commands:
[ul][li]Spawn (use as ::spawn-1) spawns one man permantly (remove via spawn.cfg) Mute (::mute-user-reason)
Ban (::ban-user-reason) [/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[QUOTE]Pretty sure some of you have played already. But I'd like you to come check out the new Soulsplit. You might have also heard that Soulsplit "sucks". I agree, it did about a year ago. But understand that a game like ours goes through a lot of development. I'm able to say that we are the most advanced server on the market right now.
[img]http://soulsplit.com/logoepic.jpg[/img]
Welcome to Soulsplit.
Official trailer: http://www.youtube.com/v/WhmJ8q8YqpI
Scroll down for pictures!
What makes soulsplit different? At soulsplit we are not concerned with making money. That is not our aim nor will it ever be. Our aim is to provide you an optimal experience followed by stellar gameplay to leave you thirsting for more. Your enjoyment of our game is what we strive for. You don’t need to pay to wear items that are overly advantageous, you don’t need to pay to explore Soulsplit at its fullest; you don’t need to buy your experience here.
That’s how it is supposed to be. That is how we do it.
#1 Pk Video: (Recorded with x10 hits toggled off) http://www.youtube.com/v/K4VriptiMls
MORE VIDEOS: http://www.youtube.com/zurielscreed
[img]http://soulsplit.com/images/rl/666.png[/img]
[img]http://soulsplit.com/images/rl/players.png[/img]
[/QUOTE]
- Enjoy[/center]

item.title: SoulSplit Release 1000+ players
item.dc:creator: @Vazzily Vazzily
item.description:
@Vazzily wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:63, topic:446308”]I always suspected that Soulsplit spoofed their player count, and now there’s proof!

Look in the PlayerHandler class at their getPlayerCount method, you will see:

public static int getPlayerCount() { Random randomGenerator = new Random(); int fakeCounter = playerCount*2+randomGenerator.nextInt(3); return fakeCounter; }

That’s some pretty hilarious shit, they literally DOUBLE their player count. I still love you, Pim.[/quote]

This actually made me laugh so hard, now imagine you would be the hoster of such a big server and someone released your source and people saw you were doubling player count… I personally would shit myself lol and I bet Pim is too.

Read full topic

item.title: SoulSplit Release 1000+ players
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

I always suspected that Soulsplit spoofed their player count, and now there’s proof!

Look in the PlayerHandler class at their getPlayerCount method, you will see:

public static int getPlayerCount() { Random randomGenerator = new Random(); int fakeCounter = playerCount*2+randomGenerator.nextInt(3); return fakeCounter; }

That’s some pretty hilarious shit, they literally DOUBLE their player count. I still love you, Pim.

Read full topic
